raw_input.text:
Stellar PR has engaged Liam O'Connor to offer support for the New retail Series on behalf of Netflix. With summer approaching, Australians are preparing for Australians are seeking better retail solutions. As the campaign's brand advocate, Liam O'Connor will deliver key messages on media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in retail.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Netflix and the Influencer for Netflix Home Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $6,453 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 2 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 2 months
- Exclusivity Period: 12 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 6 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Netflix retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.

template_mapping.best_template_match: profile_QUEEN _ The Tanna Tribe Talent Agreement_UPDATED_24.02.2025 [SIGNED]
fallback_templates: profile_Mattel Brickshop x Craig Contract FINAL.docx LOWNDES SIGNED (1) (1)
profile_HORT _ Australian Onions Talent Agreement - Jane De Graaff
